pr_title: Add get a single role from the AuthzRolesResource

timeline.message:
Add get a single role from the AuthzRolesResource

Prior to this change, there was no way to get a single Role from the
new AuthzRolesResource. But we would like to display a single role
readonly in the frontend.

This change will search for a role by id and return it.

timeline.bodyText:
this would require the user to have a roles:read:* permission.
The specific one underneath is better. I'd just remove this line.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                @RequiresPermissions(RestPermissions.ROLES_READ)
